org.codehaus.preon.hex
Interface DumpFragment

All Known Implementing Classes:
BytesAsCharFragment, BytesAsHexFragment, LinePosFragment, LiteralFragment
public interface DumpFragment

A fixed-size framgment of output.

Method Summary
 void dump(long lineNumber, byte[] buffer, int length, HexDumpTarget out)
          Dumps the contents of this fragment to out.
 int getSize(int numberOfBytes)
          The number of characters this fragment will occupy, as a function of the number of bytes that might be presented.
 

Method Detail

getSize

int getSize(int numberOfBytes)
The number of characters this fragment will occupy, as a function of the number of bytes that might be presented.

Returns:
The number of characters this fragment will occupy.

dump

void dump(long lineNumber,
          byte[] buffer,
          int length,
          HexDumpTarget out)
          throws HexDumperException
Dumps the contents of this fragment to out.

Parameters:
lineNumber - The line number.
buffer - The bytes to be rendered. (Assume that the number of bytes normally to be printed to every line is the length of this buffer.
out - The object receiving output.
Throws:
HexDumperException
